Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic and Greek legal text (marriage settlement). On recto, 14 ll. of demotic, 1 of Greek, and 1 of demotic; on verso, list of 12 witnesses. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Marriage settlement between Zeho son of Horuz and ... Date. reign of Ptol. Neos Dionysos, the year lost, but the greek docket is dated year 3, Tybi 6 = BC. 78 Jan. 14."
Bibliographic references: Pestman 1961 / Marriage and matrimonial property in ancient Egypt : a contribution to establishing the legal position of the woman (diagr. B, no.8)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (45997) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/45997)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured Black ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Window verso Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
